name: Genesis Vest
tooltip:
Genesis VestLevel 60

Bring the the Husk of the Old God, 2 Idols of Rebirth, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Ivory Scarabs to Vethsera inside Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Honored reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Husk of the Old God
- Idol of Rebirth x 2
- Bronze Scarab x 5
- Ivory Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
